name: Leaping Leo
description:
Leap your way out of hell as the great Leaping Leo!

IMPORTANT:

'F' is interact key, use it on the engines in-front of the large statues to solve the puzzle and escape hell!

ALSO: You have to extract with a third party program like 7Zip or Winrar. This is due to windows not being able to unzip certain types of engine/exe files.
